Author: thirdegreepoly
Text: wow, do we go to the same school or something? my main dining hall, on top of having the shittiest food ever, never lists the food online that they’re actually serving during a meal period. if they say they’re serving pasta they’ll be serving chicken or something instead. it fucks up what I plan during the day so much! and on top of that they JUST added vegan options after 5+ years of student complaints, and it usually ends up being overcooked plain rice. before then, they would have to specially make you food if you were vegetarian or vegan and it would always be some gross mishmash of tofu and hot sauce. they would also never give you the nutrition info either, or it would be really off. like 800 calories for one boiled egg? sure.
